synopsis.text:
Cinderella's life takes a drastic turn when her loving father remarries and leaves for business, leaving her at the mercy of her cruel stepmother and stepsisters. Once a cherished daughter of a wealthy duke, Cinderella is now reduced to a household servant, catering to her new family's every whim. Despite her hardships, Cinderella maintains her kind and gentle spirit, finding solace in her animal friends and a mysterious commoner named Charles. Unbeknownst to her, Charles is the prince of Emerald Castle, leading a mundane life within its walls until he meets Cinderella.

When the kingdom hosts a Royal Ball for the prince to choose a bride, Cinderella's stepmother forbids her from attending. However, Cinderella's animal friends and her Fairy Godmother come to her aid, providing an unexpected twist to this classic fairytale. Amidst these events, a power-hungry villain within the castle plots to overthrow the prince, adding an intriguing layer to this enchanting story. Will Cinderella find her happily ever after, or will the villain's schemes prevail? Discover the magic, friendship, and love in this captivating adaptation of the beloved fairytale, Cinderella.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
